tool_description: Defines quantitative and qualitative success metrics aligned with funder priorities and project objectives, creating measurable KPIs and evaluation frameworks for proposal development.

funder_priorities.description: List of key funder priority areas and objectives

project_type.description: Type of project: research, service, capacity-building, or advocacy

target_population.description: Description of target population or beneficiaries

measurement_frequency.description: How often metrics should be measured: monthly, quarterly, annually

baseline_available.description: Whether baseline data is available for comparison

error_messages: Empty priority or objective lists: Both funder_priorities and project_objectives must contain at least one item.
Invalid project type: project_type must be one of [research, service, capacity-building, advocacy].
Invalid measurement frequency: measurement_frequency must be one of [monthly, quarterly, annually].
Missing target population: target_population cannot be empty.
usage: Provide funder_priorities, project_objectives, project_type, and target_population. Optionally specify measurement_frequency and baseline_available for customized metric frameworks.

quantitative_metrics.description: List of measurable quantitative success indicators

short_term_indicators.description: Success metrics for first year of project

long_term_indicators.description: Success metrics for project completion and beyond

evaluation_methods.description: Recommended methods for measuring each metric

reporting_framework.description: Suggested framework for progress reporting to funder
